game.name: Moorhuhn Pirates
game.description:
Today you have reached a pirate island where your enemies are no one, but the cute and lovely flying chickens! Your job in this brand new adventure game is to shoot at all the chickens with the help of bullets. Are you ready to go on this amazing adventure prepared with the help of a pirates theme? Join Moorhuhn Pirates and be prepared to shoot like never before and discover all the secrets of this wide pirate island! 
These chickens are very clear and know how to fly and get disappeared from the screen. Use your bullets and try to kill them before they disappear from the screen in this one of the best adventure games for kids! Your every kill will reward you with some points. Remember the farther chickens you shoot the more points you will collect. So if you want to get a good score, try to kill the birds that are far away instead of shooting the nearest birds. 
The entire pirate island is invaded by these deadly chickens. Your objective in this HTML5 platform game is to clear them from the island to make their people live with calm and peace again. Remember you will only be given 10 bullets initially. Use them wisely before you are allowed to reload your gun in this cool shooter challenge! Keep your eyes on your ammo count and do not forget to click the space bar key to reload your gun! Good luck to shoot as many chickens as you can to create your own high score! Play some more free shooter games on atmegame.com to have extra fun!
